 */import BrowserDatabase from"/home/marketihor/scandipwa/packages/scandipwa/src/util/BrowserDatabase";/**
 *
 * @type {string}
 */export var COMPARE_UID='compare_uid';/**
 *
 * @type {number}
 */export var ONE_DAY=86400;/**
 *
 * @param {string} uid
 * @returns {void}
 * @namespace Util/Compare/setUid
 */export var setUid=middleware(function(uid){BrowserDatabase.setItem(uid,COMPARE_UID,ONE_DAY);},"Util/Compare/setUid\n");/**
 *
 * @returns {string|boolean} uid
 * @namespace Util/Compare/getUid
 */export var getUid=middleware(function(){var uid=BrowserDatabase.getItem(COMPARE_UID);return typeof uid==='string'?uid:false;},"Util/Compare/getUid\n");/**
 *
 * @namespace Util/Compare/removeUid
 */export var removeUid=middleware(function(){BrowserDatabase.deleteItem(COMPARE_UID);},"Util/Compare/removeUid\n");
